billing_mode.description: The billing mode of the DynamoDB table

write_capacity.description: Number of write units for this table. If the billing_mode is PROVISIONED, this field is required.

read_capacity.description: Number of read units for this table. If the billing_mode is PROVISIONED, this field is required.

table_name.description: The name of the DynamoDB table

hash_key.description: The hash key of the DynamoDB table

range_key.description: The range key of the DynamoDB table

attribute.description: The attribute of the DynamoDB table

global_secondary_indexes.description: A list of maps representing the global secondary indexes
global_secondary_indexes.type: list(object({ name: string, hash_key: string, range_key: string, projection_type: string, read_capacity: number, write_capacity: number }))

local_secondary_indexes.description: A list of maps representing the local secondary indexes
local_secondary_indexes.type: list(object({ name: string, range_key: string, projection_type: string }))

ttl.description: A map representing the TTL settings

tags.description: A map of tags to apply to the resources

stream_view_type.description: Indicates the DynamoDB Streams settings for the table. Set to `None` to disable streaming.

point_in_time_recovery_enabled.description: Indicates whether point in time recovery is to be enabled (true) or disabled (false)

server_side_encryption_enabled.description: Indicates whether server side encryption is to be enabled (true) or disabled (false)
